team.name: Sachitra
team.bio: Priya brings a unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design thinking to every project. She specializes in residential and hospitality design.

team.name: Arjun Mehta
team.bio: With over 15 years of experience, Arjun leads Strait Arc's design philosophy. His work has been recognized with multiple national and international awards.
team.education: M.Arch from MIT, B.Arch from IIT Kharagpur

team.name: Vikram Reddy
team.bio: Vikram's expertise in sustainable design and building technology ensures our projects are both beautiful and environmentally responsible.
team.education: B.Arch from SPA Delhi, LEED AP

team.name: Ananya Iyer
team.bio: Ananya's attention to detail and material expertise create interiors that are both functional and aesthetically refined.

team.name: Rohan Kapoor
team.bio: Rohan manages complex projects from conception to completion, ensuring design integrity and client satisfaction.

team.name: Neha Desai
team.bio: Neha creates landscape designs that enhance architecture while promoting biodiversity and sustainability.
